name: my_react_portfolio
description: Welcome to my web developer portfolio built with React, showcasing my skills, projects, testimonials, and providing a means for visitors to contact me. This portfolio is designed to present a professional overview of my work, making it easy for potential employers or collaborators to learn more about me.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
